Title: Relates to the tax exempt status of not-for-profit corporations or members convicted of criminal facilitation
Summary: Removes the tax exempt status of not-for-profit corporations for convictions of criminal facilitation of the organization or its officers, members or employees.
LawCode: Amd §§208 & 1116, Tax L; amd §§420-a & 420-b, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the real property tax law, in relation to removing the tax exempt status of not-for-profit corporations for convictions of criminal facilitation of the organization or its officers, members or employees
